msgov_programname: KTTP Stream One - Subject Matter Expert Activities
quartech_portalapplicationpagetitle: Knowledge and Technology Transfer Program 2024 Spring Intake
quartech_portalapplicationpagesubtitle: Stream 1: Subject Matter Expert for Knowledge Development
quartech_portalapplicationpagedescriptio:
Objective

To increase the knowledge of the B.C. agriculture and food sector to increase their competitiveness, resilience, and innovation.

Funding Information

Up to $1,500 per activity intended for (SME) activities such as (but not limited to) industry expert presentations, conferences, community gatherings and annual general meetings.
